text: Mipham Chokyi Lodro (27 October 1952 - 11 June 2014), also known as Kunzig Shamar Rinpoche, was the 14th Shamarpa of the Karma Kagyu school of Tibetan Buddhism. While giving teachings, the 14th Shamarpa died in Renchen, Germany on 11 June 2014 due to a sudden heart attack, aged 61. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Buddhist clergy Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Germany Category:Tibetan people
title: Mipham Chokyi Lodro
